column5: Apartment for 8 people. Everything for a holiday or business stay: - Wifi - Kitchen - Dinning room - Living room - TV (4) - Air conditioner - Washing center - 1 bedroom (1 king size bed) - 1 Bedroom (2 double beds) - 1 bedroom (2 single beds)  The place has: - Swimming Pool  - Elevator - Telephone  Distances in car: - River Walk: 20 min - Alamo Bowl: 20 min - Shop's at the Quarry: 15 min - Six Flags: 15 min - Sea World: 19 min - North Star Mall: 17 min - San Marcos Outlets: 50 min
